column13: Topsoil application at Northern Star involves carefully applying and managing topsoil on reclaimed areas after mining activities. This practice ensures that the topsoil layer, rich in essential nutrients and organic matter, is restored to support the growth of vegetation and ecosystem rehabilitation. By applying topsoil, Northern Star promotes responsible land reclamation, helps restore natural habitats, and minimises the environmental impact of mining operations, aligning with its commitment to sustainable and environmentally conscious practices.
